name: STEEL STOMPER
description:
Take control of Sergeant Raakel in this neo-SNES mech action game, and defeat The Oppressors!

You control the one and only, brand new prototype mech from a small Scandinavian country. There's been a lot of suspicious movement from The Oppressors from the east. As a mech pro-pilot, you must take down important assets of the evil organization and bring the world closer to peace.

  • 5 levels of shmup style weapon
  • 3 intense missions in the eastern country
  • Heavy feeling dual stick controls

Game made in around 4 days, started for GBJAM, ended up something completely different.

  • Art by: Justin Chan
  • Music by: Manna Hagström
  • Sounds by: Joonas Turner
  • Game by: Jukio Kallio

(Windows only (for now))
